original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.

analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…

original: kusalaṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: kusalam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya

analyzed: akusalam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya

analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

analyzed: akusalam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa

original: Nahetu-naārammaṇādi
analyzed: na hetu na ārammaṇa ādi

analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na ārammaṇa paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: abyākatam sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto ca naakusalo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti na ārammaṇa paccayā

original: … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: tīṇi

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā terasa …pe… napurejāte terasa …pe… najhāne namagge tīṇi, navippayutte nava …pe… novigate nava.
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi na ārammaṇe nava na adhipatiyā terasa pe na purejāte terasa pe na jhāne na magge tīṇi na vippayutte nava pe no vigate nava

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe nava

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nakusalassa nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe….
analyzed: kusalaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ pe

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare nava …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā sattarasa anantare nava pe sahajāte

original: terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte nava, kamme
analyzed: terasa aññamaññe nava nissaye terasa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa pacchājāte nava kamme

original: terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre …pe… magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte nava …pe…
analyzed: terasa vipāke tīṇi āhāre pe magge terasa sampayutte nava vippayutte nava pe

original: avigate terasa. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: avigate pañhāvāram pi

analyzed: paccanīya

analyzed: pañca na jhāne na magge na sampayutte tīṇi no natthiyāḥ no vigate tīṇi sahajāta vāram pi

original: …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
